that is comparable to US sovereign money market rate in the base currency of the sub-fund. However, preservation of capital is not guaranteed. The Managers may only invest in short-term deposit and other money market instruments. At least 70% of the sub-fund’s net asset value will be invested in US dollar-denominated short-term deposits and money market instruments issued by governments, quasi-governments, international organizations, financial institutions and other corporations. The Managers’ policy for the sub-fund is to use the interbank wholesale money market for short-term deposits for periods usually not exceeding 12 months and invest in monetary instruments such as treasury bills, bills of exchange, commercial papers, certificates of deposit or interbank deposits, to achieve the sub-fund’s investment objective.","hsbcCategoryCode":"SD","hsbcCategoryName":"Short Duration Fund","dividendYield":0,"distributionFrequency":null,"riskLvlCde":"1","currency":"USD","expenseRatio":null,"marginRatio":null,"initialCharge":0,"annualManagementFee":0.3,"assetsUnderManagement":698622969,"assetsUnderManagementCurrencyCode":"USD","topPerformersIndicator":null,"topSellProdIndex":"N","investmentRegionCode":"NA","investmentRegionName":"North America","channelRestrictList":["SI_I"],"fundClassCde":"WIC","amcmIndicator":"N","nextDealDate":"2025-08-13","surveyedFundNetAssetsDate":"2025-08-13","riskFreeRateName":"USTREAS T-Bill Auction Ave 3 Mon","relativeRiskMeasuresIndexName":"Morningstar USD 1M Cash TR USD","dayEndBidOfferPricesDate":null,"dayEndNAVDate":"2025-08-13","prodStatCde":"A","allowBuy":"N","allowSell":"Y","allowSwInProdInd":"Y","allowSwOutProdInd":"Y","allowSellMipProdInd":"N","annualReportDate":"2024-07-31","piFundInd":null,"deAuthFundInd":null,"weekRangeLowDate":"2024-08-14","weekRangeHighDate":"2025-08-13"}}}
